product_name: Pearl Izumi Infinity Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Designed to boost running comfort mile after mile, the women's Pearl Izumi Infinity Shorts feature a fast-drying liner brief made of special Minerale(TM) polyester. Lightweight polyester outer shorts wick moisture, dry fast and offer UPF 50+ sun protection. Minerale-polyester liner brief dries 50% faster than ordinary polyester, offering evaporative cooling and odor resistance. Minerale technology will not wash off or wear out; simply wash the shorts to renew their performance qualities. Waist has smooth front panel with elasticized sides and back; stretch drawcord fine-tunes the fit. 1 zippered back pocket; reflective trim. Pearl Izumi Infinity Shorts for women have a screen print design on the side panel. Closeout.
